TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit GridViewEditEventArgs extends System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当单击 "编辑" 按钮 (按钮 `CommandName` 设置为 "编辑" ) ，但在 控件进入编辑模式之前，控件引发事件。The control raises the event when an Edit button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Edit") is clicked, but before the control enters edit mode. 这使你可以提供一种事件处理方法，该方法可在每次发生此事件时执行自定义例程，如取消编辑操作。This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as canceling the edit operation, whenever this event occurs. 对象传递给事件处理方法，该方法允许您确定要编辑的行的索引，并指示应取消编辑操作。A object is passed to the event-handling method, which allows you to determine the index of the row being edited and to indicate that the edit operation should be canceled. 若要取消编辑操作，请将 对象的属性设置 为 `true` 。To cancel the edit operation, set the property of the object to `true`. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). 有关实例的初始属性值的列表 ，请参见 构造函数。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructor. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 传递给事件处理方法的对象来取消编辑操作（如果用户尝试编辑包含姓氏为白色的作者的行）。The following example demonstrates how to use the object passed to the event-handling method to cancel the editing operation if the user attempts to edit a row that contains an author with the last name White. [!code-aspx-csharp[GridViewRowEditing#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewRowEditing/CS/gridviewroweditingcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[GridViewRowEditing#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewRowEditing/VB/gridviewroweditingvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数初始化类的新实例 。Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the class. 下表显示了实例的初始属性值 。The following table shows the initial property value for an instance of . |propertiesProperty|初始值Initial value| |--------------|-------------------| ||`newEditIndex` 参数的值。The value of the `newEditIndex` parameter.| > [!NOTE] > 此构造函数主要由控件开发人员在引发事件时使用。This constructor is used primarily by control developers when raising events.

summary.span: 获取或设置所编辑的行的索引。

span.span: Gets or sets the index of the row being edited.
The index of the row being edited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可确定所编辑的行的索引。Use the property to determine the index of the row being edited. 行索引通常用于从控件集合中检索此行 ，这允许您访问行的属性。The row index is often used to retrieve this row from the collection of the control, which allows you to access the row's properties. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性来确定所编辑的行的索引。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to determine the index of the row being edited. [!code-aspx-csharp[GridViewRowEditing#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewRowEditing/CS/gridviewroweditingcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[GridViewRowEditing#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewRowEditing/VB/gridviewroweditingvb.aspx#1)]
